captions.text: Gorky Film Studio
SEVENTEEN MOMENTS OF SPRING
Part 11.
Shtirlitz,

I am ordering you to remain in
my office for a few more minutes.
Bern, Switzerland.
As a former statesman of Germany,

you must think not only about Germany's
past, but also about its future.

I am certain that the future of our 
native home land concerns you a lot.

My dear pastor, I am a politician, 
in the emigration.

You see, a man, who is absent, 
is always being a little wrong.

I am not interesting to London or to 
to the White House or to anyone.

The politicians there possess power, 
but I am deprived of any real power.

No one loses their professional 
influence as rapidly as politicians

who, for whatever reason, deprived 
of their political authority.

Whom would you consider serious 
politicians in today's Germany?

No one. Hitler killed all the best 
representatives of the opposition.

The most serious politician in 
Germany today is Himmler himself.

He is in blood from head to toe. 
He is the disgrace of Germany.

But he possesses the real authority
and the real political power now.

A politician, who possesses a real 
political authority, rules the people.

Only with such a person others would 
deal equivalently in the politics.

Do you really consider a possibility 
that Americans, Englishmen, or anyone,

or any good people, who still believe 
in Christ, would ever agree to sit down

at the same table and negotiate 
with the antichrist Himmler?

My dear pastor, the big politics 
sent into the oblivion any of your

terms of Christ and antichrist. 
And terms of Good and evil.

Big politics only adhere to the precise 
observance of balance of powers.

Here you go, for example. 
This is a secret transcript.

One my friend obtained this transcript 
of the secret conversations

of one important German officer 
of SD. Mr. Gogenloye.

He is a personal close friend 
of Himmler himself.

Those were talks with some Western 
intelligence officers.
And this was a year ago.
I left my glasses somewhere.

Basically, the main idea of the talks
is that, the both sides, the Germans

and the West, understand the threat 
of the Russian Communism.

Both sides are concerned about 
the future of Germany, and the

issue of the retention of the institute 
of German National Socialism must be

examined with understanding of the
prospective Russian Communist thread.

It sounds like a propaganda cooked 
by the German Nazis themselves.
I refuse to believe this.

I would be glad to agree with you, 
but, unfortunately, I have

very good reasons to believe 
that this document is real.

Hitler's days are numbered as 
a political figure in Germany.

Probably, Goering and Bormann 
already think about it and plan how,

seemingly, to take political power 
in Germany into their own hands.

I do not believe that Himmler could 
become a fair leader of Germany,

but this is desired by certain 
political circles in the West.

But I think about the fact that 
the democratic public opinion

will never allow the fact of 
such secret negotiations

with a man, who personifies with
the horror of National Socialism.
Never the less, I am still convinced,

that Himmler is the strongest 
political figure of today's Germany.

But I am, in no way, can visualize, 
from one side, a possibility of

any negotiations with Himmler, 
but from another side, how would

it be possible to hold Germany 
in the obedience without Himmler?

Do you think, such negotiations 
really could be possible?

They already are happening. 
Right here, in Bern, Switzerland.

The negotiations are conducted by 
Himmler's General SS, Mr. Karl Wolf

with the trusted representative of 
the Western intelligence officers.
How trustworthy is this information?

A politician in emigration uses 
only verifiable, confirmed information.

- Are you sure that the negotiations are real? 
- Yes, I am absolutely sure about that.

My friends in Germany directed me 
to check a possibility of serious

negotiations with all the allies 
in order to end this bloodshed.
Who are those people?
They are honest and good people.

They work in the Ministry of Foreign 
Affairs and in the Nazi party management.

Some people work in SD. They, 
actually, helped me to get here.

They told me to warned you, not to
trust Himmler under any conditions.
That man should never be trusted.

No one should ever negotiate with him 
directly or with any of his people.
May I ask you a question?

Do you completely trust those people, 
who arranged for you to come here?

I trust those people completely.
I trust them with my own life.
All right then.

My friends informed me about the issues 
that were discussed at the negotiations,

between German General SS, Karl Wolf,
and the Western intelligence.

Especially, please take a look at
this interesting document, I have.
Top Secret.
For authorized personnel only.

The negotiation with General SS
Karl Wolf are now under a new code
"Sun Rise Crossword".

Bertha Uhanssons, Sveveges Street 7. 
Stockholm, Sweden.

Aunt Elsa stayed in Bern, Lozanne. 
She feels here well. But she is

greatly homesick and that is why each 
week she writes letters home. Gustav.

In 2 days the decoded message from 
Stockholm will be read in Moscow, Russia.
In Bern and Lozane, Switzerland

negotiations started between Himmler's 
representative General SS Karl Wolf

and authorized representative of 
the Western allies.

The details about the negotiations
will be provided via Stockholm.

Now answer to my one simple question. 
Where is your pastor Shlag, Shtirlitz?
It is none of your damn business!
How dare you talking to me like that!

I understand, you had lots of stress today,
but nevertheless, watch your manners.

Gruppenfyurer, I am sorry for being 
so obnoxious. I had a hard day today.

I may forgive you, if you will tell
me all the real truth, dear Shtirlitz.

I understand, that transcripts of all 
telephone conversations with Mr. Bormann

lie down on the table of reichsfurer Himmler, 
after they were examined by Mr. Shellenberg.

I understand, that you can not disobey
the orders of the reichsfurer Himmler,

even if they are incited by your 
friend and my chief.

I do believe that you were ordered 
to arrest the chauffeur of Bormann

by your management, even though he,
the driver, was and is a good man.

Why are you so sure that I was 
ordered to do all of that?
You were ordered to compromise me.
To do it by whatever means possible.

So that, I could not see the Nazi 
party boss, Mr. Bormann, any longer.

I've noticed the way you constructed 
and conducted the entire show today.

You did have everything as always, but 
there was no inspiration in you today,

because you realized, who would 
benefit from the fact,
if I would never talk to Bormann again.

And about "why" they want to stop me,
I will tell you after my return.

I have no time to talk to you. 
At 5:00PM I have a meeting with Mr. Bormann.

I do not think that it is in your
interests to remove me from the game yet.

- Where do you have the meeting? 
- Near the museum of Nature Study.

Who will be the driver this time? 
The second personal chauffeur?

No, we know that he is reporting to 
the Gestapo and Shellenberg as well.

- Who are those "we"? - "We", the true 
patriots of Germany and the Fuhrer.

You will go to the meeting in one
of our special car.

This is just for the purposes 
of your own safety.

In the briefcase you'll have a dictaphone. 
Record the entire conversation with Bormann.

Will you please discuss with him 
the fate of his first chauffeur.

You were right, I was ordered to arrest
the driver by my management and I was

ordered to apply to him the third 
degree of the extreme tortures too.

Then we'll listen to the recorded 
conversation together carefully.

- My car will wait at the museum. 
- This is unwise.
You do know where I live, don't you?

Here is the door key. Go there 
and wait for me in there.

Bormann brings me home in his 
car after our meetings.

If the chauffeur would tell you this, 
you wouldn't question me for 7 hours.

What if I would carry out my orders 
as I should have? What's then?

I could have killed you 7 hours ago.
Didn't you still get it, snobby moron?

Then you would remain face to face 
all alone with many enemies.
Here, in this very building.

And I am not really sure if you could
win against all of your enemies here.

- Hail Hitler! 
- Stop that bullshit with "hail".

I am sick and tired of hearing 
that stupid last name.

I beg your pardon, sir. 
I don't understand you.

Cut it out this shit. 
Stop pretending!
You do understand everything very well.

Our Fuhrer is not capable of making
intelligent decisions any longer.

And don't confuse or don't mix up the 
interests of Germany and Adolf Hitler's.

- Do you even realize what you just said? 
- Yes! Yes! Yes!

I am totally aware of everything 
what I just said to you.

In this room there is no recording 
microphones. No one can hear us.

And no one will believe you, if you
report on what I just said to you.

But it's not in your interests, even 
trying reporting on me any way.
But for your information...

please listen carefully and make up
your own mind about what I am about

to tell you. This comes from my heart.
And it is not easy to say for me.
Hitler brought Germany to the catastrophe,

and I don’t see any positive resolution
of the historical situation we are in.

Do you understand what I am saying? 
I don’t see any good resolution of it.
Sit down! Sit down!

You have 20 minutes before the meeting, 
and it takes less than 10 to get there.

Don't you think, that Bormann has his 
own plan of rescuing Germany, a plan

that is different than reichsfurer's? 
You bet he does.

All the people of Himmler abroad are
under the surveillance by everyone.

Himmler's foreign connections
are practically non-existing.

But Bormann's connections in North America 
and in England are very strong.

I am not even mentioning his Brazilian
connections which are enormous.

Himmler would not be able to disappear 
in this world after the war.

Bormann sure can disappear and 
no one will ever find him.

But please drop a hint to Bormann, 
very politely and professionally,

that, when everything ends in a crash 
and very soon, he will not survive

or disappear without true professionals
like myself.

The majority of Himmler's accounts 
in the foreign banks are under

a tight control by the allies, so
they could be all frozen by them.

And Bormann has a hundred times more 
accounts and no one knows about them.

By helping Bormann to overcome 
his enemy right now, you could

earn some guarantees for a comfortable
future existence after this war.

Himmler's gold is just trifles 
compared to Bormann's gold.
Hitler knew very well that
Himmler's gold is uncontrolled.

He well realized, that Himmler's gold
only for immediate tactical purposes.

But Bormann's gold is the gold of 
the Nazi party itself.

It is the gold that is stored very 
safely in several foreign countries.

And even Shellenberg with his spy agents
will not be able to find that gold.
That gold is for those intellectuals,

who, after a lapse of the time, will,
at last, clearly understand, that

in this world simply there is nothing 
better than National Socialism.

The gold of the Nazi party is our 
bridge to future. To our eternity!

That gold is for those of our children, 
who are 1 to 3 year old today.

Those, who are 10 year old now, hate us
and all our political views and ideas.

They simply can not forgive us for all the 
hunger and bombings they are through now.

But the ones, who are in their cradles now, 
will consider us true legendary heroes.

And a beautiful fake legend must be
always well fed and supported.

Those, younger ones, will re-read 
our books and re-think our ideas.

They will rule the human kind 
in 20 years after this war.
And if only anywhere in the world

instead of "how do you do" any one 
would shout "Hail" to greet anyone

like we do now with our Fuhrer Hitler. 
It will mean, that they, the future Nazis,

are there and ready and from that point 
in history, we’ll begin our great revival.

How old will you be in 1965? 
Only 70 years old.

You are lucky. You will be alive and
see the revival of the Nazi movement.

70 year is the age of the bloom 
for wise politicians.
And I will be way over 80 by then.

Therefore I am very concerned about
the forthcoming 10 years of my life.

Just remember that you can trust me
in your game, without reservations,

I can become very useful for you and,
especially, for him, for Mr. Bormann.

A cruel Mr. Mueller, Chief of the Gestapo, 
in reality is just an old, good, humble man,

who wants quietly to live up his years 
at a small farm with the pool and flowers.

And for that I am ready and willing 
to do anything at all. Anything!
And one more little thing.

It's not necessary to tell this to your 
buddy Bormann, but you should know.

In order to, safely, move from Berlin 
to a nice house somewhere in tropics,
one ought not to hurry up yet.

Many mongrels of the Fuehrer will try
running away soon. They'll be killed.

But best time is when Berlin will be 
crashed by the Russian cannonade,

when the soldiers would battle 
for each building in the city.

Then, it will be possible to leave, 
without slamming the door. Quietly.

To leave and to take along the 
secret of gold of the Nazi party,

which is known only to Bormann 
and to Fuhrer himself.

And after the Fuhrer leaves this
world into the nonexistence,

it is necessary to become very 
useful to Mr. Bormann at that time.

He, Bormann, could be the next 
Fuhrer of the 20th century.

So, right now it is important to be
patient and have enough endurance,

if you want to survive the war and
have a good living after it.

Otherwise you will burn in the oven 
like prisoners in our death camps now.
Now you may go to your secret meeting.

The dictaphone you will 
get from Bittner.

And don't even try pretending to me 
that you believe in Hitler's victory.

Don't even try it because I can clearly
see everything in your traitorous eyes.

Simply again think over everything 
what I just said to you in this room.

You see how quickly I changed your
mind and recruited you to work for me.

For only 5 minutes and without any 
of your special fancy tricks.

We'll talk about the future for your boss, 
Mr. Shellenberg, some time later.

You will say to Bormann that without 
my aid in Switzerland he will fail.

So, if that's the case then he will 
need you more than me. That's bad for me.

No. He understands, that I can not
do much without your direct help.

Because I don't have many "my people"
working in your boss' department.
Well, what's the progress?

They combed the entire city and  
could not find that woman anywhere.

Any reports from the people at 
Shtirlitz' house?

No one called him on the phone. 
No one was visiting his house.

Let my cutthroats stay in his house
until Mr. Bormann's car will be...

Yes. Until Mr. Bormann's car will 
be on its way to Babelsberg town.

Then they all must leave immediately. 
And remove all listening devises too.

Order at all train stations to detain 
all young women with babies

for an immediate questioning 
by the police on site.

- Do they have her pictures there? 
- Yes, all stations have her pictures.
- Your ticket, please?

I do not have any money. My home 
was bombed. I have nothing left.

Please try applying for help at 
the department of refugees.
I will do that. Thanks.
Please wake up. An air raid again.

- What is happening? 
- An air raid. Let's go quickly.
Let us help you to carry your children.
- No, they will be with me.
- Then hurry up, please.
Please help me. My home was bombed.

I have nothing left, not even
diapers for my babies.

- I don't know what to do now. 
- We'll help you out with what we have.

In what degree should I trust Muller
or use the services he is offering?

In due time, I will test his loyalty 
to me as well as his services to me.
This is interesting. Very!

- Where's the talk about his chauffeur? 
- There was no space left on the tape.

I couldn't just say - "wait a minute, 
I must flip the tape over, dear Mr. Bormann".

I said to him that as far as I know, 
you personally have nothing to do

with his tortures at the Gestapo and
that you did everything to save his life.

- What did he say to that? 
- He said that his chauffeur, probably,

is broken after tortures in the Gestapo 
and he could not trust him any more.

He really doesn't care about the fate 
of his former driver any more at all.

You can do whatever you want with him. 
You may try saving his live for real.

- Do you think anyone will look for him? 
- Like who?

- Bormann, for instance. 
- He wouldn't care less about him.

The chauffeur's life doesn't mean 
anything to him at all.

Let's talk about the Russian woman. 
Is she doing any better now?
Is she back from the hospital?

I do not understand, how she could 
become useful to us in this game?

She could be not just radio operator
for us, but also we could be...

able to implicate her with the 
traitor General Wolf in Switzerland.
That's an utopia. Impossible.

I guess, I have a greater ability 
to daydream and fantasize than you.

- Well, I was thinking... 
- Thinking about what?
Nothing. Forget it.

Well, I simply re-analyzed your 
today's proposal for cooperation.

Stop thinking about the Russian woman.
I relocated her to a new place for now.

- Did Ralf overdo his job with her? 
- Yes, somewhat he overdid it.
And therefore he is killed?

None of your damn business.
This is my shit, Shtirlitz.

I want you to understand one simple 
thing about your position in this game.

You'll know only so much and I will 
decide how much you should know.

I don't like, when people spy on 
me through a keyhole in the door.

And I don't like when anyone tries using 
me thinking that I am stupid moron.

I am not stupid and not a moron! 
I am a true hard player in this game.

- Are you always "a hard player"? 
- Yes, almost always.
All right then.
Let's discuss that some other time.

Please rewind the tape back. 
I want to listen to it again.

- Would you like some more coffee?
- Yes, I’d love some more, please.

- Would you like some cognac? 
- No, I cannot stand it.

I like simple potato vodka. 
It warms me up inside.

I love its, simple, peasant taste. 
It is good for the blood vessels.

- Do you want to write down the text? 
- No need. I will memorize it.
There is a very curious part there.

Do the Western allies realize that 
General Karl Wolf represents Himmler?

- I think that is self-explanatory. 
- In this case this is not the answer.

If I had proofs that they look at Wolf
as the representative of Himmler then

it would be possible to talk about the
disintegration of the ally coalition.

If the Western allies would agree 
to deal and negotiate with Himmler,

then I will need the copies of their 
recorded talks and negotiations.

They will be given to Goebbels and, 
he'll use them in his radio propaganda.

And I can't even predict, how it would 
effect the relationship of the Kremlin

- and London and the White House. 
- What about us, here, in Berlin?
I don't care about "us" or "Berlin".

Will you be able to obtain a tape
with their recorded conversations?

We must have absolute proofs that Wolf 
comes out as the emissary of Himmler.

Why would you think that he didn't give 
such assertions to the Western allies?
I simply express my assumption.

Propaganda of our enemies shows 
Himmler as if he is a true devil of hell.

They attempt to go around the fact, 
whom actually represents General Wolf.

The main thing, that interests them, 
is how powerful he and Himmler are?

How powerful they are over the 
entire German Armed Forces.

It is necessary that they know, whom 
represents Wolf, from Wolf himself.
Directly from Wolf himself.
Or at least from you.

In order for me to, successfully, 
carry out this difficult operation,

I would need more people working with 
me here and even more in Switzerland.

It's hard for me right now, since 
I don't have a large group of officers,

who would each add something useful
to this complicated project.

And nevertheless I will try to
complete the task with what I have.

I will allocate any available to
me resources for this task.

Unfortunately, we are deprived 
of many resources nowadays.

Do you think, Stalin will be happy, 
if we let him learn about the fact,

that his Western allies are negotiating 
not with someone unknown dissident,
but directly with Himmler?

Not with a group of Army Generals, 
who want don’t have any real power,

not with a stupid moron Ribbentrop, 
whose brain completely decomposed,

but with a man, who is capable of 
turning Germany into a steel stronghold

- against the Russians and their communism? 
- I am sure, Stalin will not be happy.

Stalin, simply, might not even believe it, if 
we would provide such information to him.

But what if this would be reported by 
an arch enemy of National-socialism?

I suppose, your pastor Shlag could 
do it or someone else like him?
We should coordinate this with Mueller.

He could select a best candidate 
from the political opposition if needed.

Mueller always attempts to offer his
services to me as a courtesy.

As far as I known, his position 
is extremely difficult right now.

He can't take chances because 
he is a very visible public figure.

And also, he is subordinated 
directly to Himmler himself.

We have to consider the entire 
complexity of his situation, but

I am convinced that he could be
very important in our game,

especially, if he would know that 
you would cover up for him.

He is not too important for me
at this point of the game yet.
Now, let's talk about the main thing.

Your task is not to interfere with
the negotiations, but to help them.

You need to reveal main Himmler's 
conspirators here in Berlin and

reveal their connection to the
secret Himmler's negotiations

in order to compromise by them,
Himmler in the eyes of the Fuhrer,

the Western allies in Stalin's eyes,
and General Wolf in Himmler's eyes.
If I would require an additional aid,
whom should I contact for support?

Carry out all Shellenberg's orders, 
but be careful. He is some smart fox.

Be aware, in our embassy in Switzerland 
every one is a Gestapo agent there.

I will inform my people there and
they will contact you if needed.

And what if I would require a help
against my boss, Mr. Shellenberg?

Such assistance could only be 
rendered by one person. Mr. Muller.

To what extend should I use his 
services in this game?

Fully. But he should not be informed
about all the details of it yet.
This telephone does not work.

- Where is a working telephone? 
- At the next train station.

- Is this an emergency? 
- It is a true emergency, sir.
All right, then. Follow me please.

WANTED. 
VERY DANGEROUS CRIMINAL.
Wanted. KETRIN KINN.

You are correct. I will use my
channels to deal with the issue.

And concerning your last question, 
partaygenosse, sir, I think that
in a few days I will be able to

provide you with a precise 
and exhausting answer to it.

- Excuse me, gruppenfurer - telephone.
- Yes, sure, go ahead. Pick it up.

- Shtirlitz is speaking. 
- Hi. It is me.

Yes, partaygenosse, sir. Right away.
I am listening to you Mr. Bormann, sir.
Yes, sir.

- It is I, Ket. 
- Where would you wait for me, sir?

- Where is that place, sir?
- I am at a train station. In the police.

I only came here to use their 
phone to call you.

- Where is it, sir? 
- At Merkishes Museum train station.

There's very little time to think over. 
If his phone being listen by the Gestapo

then this information will reach
Muller only in a few hours.

But most likely, he ordered to remove
listening. It's not in Muller interests.

He said to Shtirlitz tonight too much 
to be afraid of any listening himself.

Now the main thing is to save Ket. 
The rest can be taken care of later.
Yes, I clearly understood you, sir.
Thank you, sir.
Will you wait for my return, gruppenfyurer?

And my secretary, Sholts, would then
report to Himmler, that I am absent?

What is this phone call about? 
You didn't say that he would call.

You did hear it yourself. He ordered me 
urgently to arrive to see him right now.

Immediately after the talk with him,
see me. I’ll be in my office waiting.

- Sholts started ratting you out? 
- I think so and long time ago.
He is just stupid.

I really like hard working 
but quite stupid secretaries,

but, this is only a good thing in 
the days of victories. Not now.

Now, when we lost this war, they 
only care about saving their asses.

Cowards! There’re no heroes any more.
Everyone is a dirty traitor and a fool.

Himmler is the biggest fool of all.
He can't even hide his peace talks.

Even stupid Sholts was able to
figure out that already.

- Would you like some more coffee? 
- No. I had enough of your coffee.

In an hour Ket with the children 
was already sitting in Shtirlitz' car.

He drove around the city for another hour
to make sure no one follows them.

He was listening to Ket's crazy story, 
about all what has happened to her.

Listening to her, he was attempting 
to analyze, if her miraculous escape

could or could not be a part of 
the devilish game of sly Muller,

or has occurred that unique case, which 
is known to every spy in the world

and which happens only once 
in life for every spy.

Katyusha, move over to the 
back seat with the children.

- Did something happen? 
- Nothing. Everything is fine now.

You and me, we won this battle now. 
And our enemies, they all lost!
Be careful, please.
Give me a second, please.
I will take the girl now.

Arrange your children and 
try to fall asleep.

- You stay here and wait for me.
- And where are you going?

Don't worry. You are completely
safe in my car.

- And where are we going now? 
- To a place not far from here.

Please try to fall asleep, 
you need to have a good sleep.

There will be a lot of serious 
excitements today and tomorrow.

- What kind of excitements? 
- Pleasant ones, of course.

Shtirlirts parked his car near 
the house of Shellenberg.

"Please be home, damn Shelenberg!"
Shtirlitz was repeating in his head.

"I hope he's home and didn't go to Himmler 
or to anyone else in Berlin yet."

He has to convince Shellenberg that he,
Shtirlitz, must go to Switzerland right now.

He has to obtain his permissions
to leave the country right away.

Muller knows about the special
mission of Karl Wolf in Switzerland.
Are you out of your damn mind!

That is impossible. 
It just can't be!
No. This is simply impossible!

Believe it or not, sir, but he knows
almost everything, that sly Muller.
How can you be so sure about that?

Muller offered me to work for him
directly against you and Wolf.

And why would he propose this
specifically to you?

Probably, his people discovered
and spy on our pastor in Switzerland.
Take a sit. Let's talk.
Yes, his people found our pastor Shlag.

I must go to Bern, Switzerland 
as soon as possible.

I'll give up our pastor to the
Gestapo agents, so you,

would be able to save Karl Wolf
by bringing him here.

- Immediately go to Bern, Switzerland. 
- What about the documents?

- Or should I just cross the border? 
- No, that is foolish.

No, you could fall into the 
hands of Swiss authorities.

Go to our department and get a  
reliable passport for yourself.
I will call the office for you.

No need to call. Just write down
an executive memo to them.

- Give me your pen, please. 
- It's better if you use yours.

Well, I still did not awake yet. 
They only recognize my special pen.

Shtirlitz drove his car to the border, 
with two new passports in his pocket.

One for himself and the other for 
his wife, frau Ingrid von Kirshtein.
Border Patrol.

Mr. Von Kirshtein here is 
your passport. Thank you.

Ingrid, darling, would you, please, 
help me.
Go and find out what is the matter.
Border patrol. Mountain Check Point.

What? I beg your pardon. 
Yes, right away.
The end of part 11.

Translated by Fooper01.
Enjoy
